title: Vacation Reviews
desc: A PHP web app built using the CodeIgniter framework. This app allows users to create and review vacation destinations. All user/vacation data is stored using a MySQL database.

title: Events Manager
desc: An event management app with full authentication for planning and managing events. It was built using Vue, Vuetify, and Firebase.

title: Arcade Cabinet
desc: For a project management class, I worked in an agile environment with weekly scrum meetings to create a table-top arcade cabinet. The arcade cabinet was created using a Rasberry Pi and RetroPie to manage and emulate games.

title: Restaurant Review App
desc: A Ruby on Rails CMS that allows users to add and review their favorite (or least favorite) restaurants. Styled using Bootstrap and some Sass. Has full user authentication thanks to the devise gem.
